SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.BrandName) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID , AA.BrandCode , AA.Code , AA.Name , AA.Url , AA.ListPrice , AA.SalePrice , AA.Option1Type , AA.Option1Name , AA.Option2Type , AA.Option2Name , AA.CategoryName
FROM dbo.TScrapProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID# AND AA.BrandCode = #BrandCode#
AND ( AA.Code = #FindText# OR AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

INSERT INTO dbo.TScrapProduct ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, SiteID, BrandCode, Code, Name, Url, ListPrice, SalePrice, Option1Type, Option1Name, Option2Type, Option2Name, CategoryName, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #SiteID#, #BrandCode#, #Code#, #Name#, #Url#, #ListPrice#, #SalePrice#, #Option1Type#, #Option1Name#, #Option2Type#, #Option2Name#, #CategoryName#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
